short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate keyword editing for PPC campaigns.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Better UX for editing negative keywords on PPC platforms. Save time when optimizing your PPC campaign. Works on Google Ads and Microsoft Advertising.

- Negative keyword picker. Build a list of negative keywords by clicking words in the search query table. 
- Mass editor for keywords / negative keywords. Set maximum CPC and change match type (exact/phrase/broad) for all picked keywords.
- Secure and easy to use. Your data is safe — MirachSEM needs no login. Install the extension, press ctrl+M/option+M, and enjoy extended functionality. 

Here to make PPC specialists' life easier.
